settings.tooltip: Endpoint from which to pull data.

settings.label: Project *
settings.tooltip: Project name from which to pull logs.

settings.name: subscription
settings.label: Subscription *
settings.tooltip: Subscription within the configured project to pull logs.

settings.name: full_response_size
settings.label: Full Response Size
settings.tooltip: Number of messages needed to mark a stream as 'busy'. This helps decide if additional streams are needed.

settings.name: max_concurrency
settings.label: Max Concurrency
settings.tooltip: Maximum number of stream connections that can be open simultaneously.

settings.name: poll_time_seconds
settings.label: Poll Time (seconds)
settings.tooltip: Set how frequently to check if active streams are busy and if need to open a new one.

settings.name: retry_delay_secs
settings.label: Retry Delay (seconds)
settings.tooltip: Time to wait between each retry attempt after an error, in seconds.

settings.name: keepalive_secs
settings.label: Keep-Alive (seconds)
settings.tooltip: Time (in seconds) of inactivity before sending a keepalive request. Setting this to more than 60 seconds may result in occasional server errors.

advanced.label: Enable TLS
advanced.tooltip: Enable TLS for incoming or outgoing connections.

settings.tooltip: List of inputs for this destination

settings.tooltip: Name of destination S3 bucket, E.g. my-bucket

settings.name: key_prefix
settings.label: Key Prefix *
settings.tooltip: Prefix to be added to the keys of objects while uploading data to an S3 bucket, act like directory path for organizing your objects in a bucket. If using a prefix for this purpose, it must end in / to act as a directory path. A trailing / is not automatically added E.g. "year=%Y/month=%m/day=%d"

settings.name: region
settings.label: Region
settings.tooltip: Region where the S3 bucket is located.

settings.tooltip: Configures how events are encoded into raw bytes
